Trep Media Group is a premium digital-first publisher representing a portfolio of owned and operated digital publications, podcasts and social properties that distribute content for driven millennials in the entrepreneurial, creator lifestyle and influence markets, ages 21-37 and reaches 12M monthly impressions.HDFMagazine.com & Prsuit.com, our flagship sites, bring interviews and over 400 global editorial contributors to set the standard of engaging, relevant lifestyle and entrepreneurial content for the aspirational millennial reader to reflect these markets: Entrepreneurship, Fashion, Fitness, Product Developers, Tech, Real Estate, Finance, Automotive, LifestyleOur Podcast, The Hustle Sold Separately, has produced more than 70 episodes of creators featured in Forbes, USAToday, INC Magazine, Fast Company, Huffington Post, Entrepreneur.com and many more. We are featured in iTunes Top 15 New & Noteworthy, were recently rated in the Top 15 Podcasts for Small Business Owners and have amassed record numbers in a short time period.TMG readers are educated, experience driven, trend setting, fashion forward, creators, innovators, doers and consumers who stay ahead of trends and influence those around them.TREP MEDIA GROUP has footprints, in Chicago, Scottsdale and Vancouver.

Hustle & Deal Flow™ is a content & influencer platform (blog / magazine) dedicated to bringing awareness to the World's Entrepreneurs & Creators of the "New Economy" (new industries characterized by cutting edge technology, hyper-growth and globally connected cultures). They are rising stars and the world needs to know about them.Find interesting articles on new emerging companies, the people who run them and resources to help you grow and scale your business in a digitally connected world.Please sign up at hdfmagazine.com to get exclusive content that matters on business and all things digital
Why Hustle & Deal Flow™ Was Created
Why Hustle & Deal Flow™ Was Created

FORBES featured Podcast - Listen on ITUNES here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/hustle-sold-separately/id1052379353“The Hustle Sold Separately” is a weekly podcast dedicated to the emerging creative entrepreneurial class, new-economy doers and global non-conformists. We motivate and inspire by documenting the hustle – actionable advice and interviews from global creators and peers who are embracing the journey, building their brands, growing their companies and disrupting industry, as well as relevant content that matters during your own personal and professional journey. Take our show on the go while you’re traveling, working out or doing some reflecting. We end each show with the “hustler” thought of the day that can be directly applied to your own journey. We’re not just a show, we’re a movement.

Matt Gottesman - Stealth Digital LLC is a global digital consultancy that focuses on scaling companies, organizations, brands, products and startups across international markets and through the use of technology and the Internet.I help build digital online experiences that matter . . . collectively, and we build for scale. I consult with Brands, VC's, Startups and Individuals.Specialties:Copywriting & Content Strategy, Creation & DistributionSales Funnel & Email MarketingInfluencer Marketing & Lifestyle MarketingLead Generation & User AcquisitionDigital BrandingTechnology Due DiligenceUser Experience Due DiligenceGo-To-MarketSocial MediaResources in: UI/UX, Development, Mobile, eCommerce, Enterprise, Branding, DesignFor More Info: www.MattGottesman.com

MakersAndMoguls.com - Makers and Moguls is both an online community and interactive video course series that teaches you what you need to know to build an online presence and create influence that drives brand awareness, traffic and sales.Whether you’re just getting started out online with your brand or business, or you’re seasoned but ready for serious growth, Makers & Moguls will provide the kind of atmosphere you need to impact your business, become more profitable and have more freedom in the process to live the life of your choosing.

summary: It's about results, not theory: (Transparency & Hustle)My Year In Review:- 30K Email Subscribes in 6 months- 120K Followers on Instagram in 1 year- 75% to 90% opt-in rates for our campaigns- 5% to 10% conversion rates for our products- 15% to 20% open rates for our emails- 500,000 Podcast DownloadsInternet Media Entrepreneur w/expertise in Digital Brands & Scaling Companies Online - Featured in Entrepreneur Magazine, Inc. Magazine, Forbes, AZTech.org, Infusionsoft, & ClearVoiceCONNECTWebsite: http://mattgottesman.com/Instagram: @hdfmagazineTwitter: @startupgottsMedia Company: http://trepmediagroup.comBlog Magazine: http://www.hdfmagazine.comPodcast: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/hustle-sold-separately/id1052379353ABOUTA tech enthusiast and passionate about all things web, I'm a global digital strategist and technology advisor, creator and editor-in-chief of Hustle & Deal Flow™ (an online magazine dedicated to the world's entrepreneurs, creators and makers), a Social Media Influencer and a consultant on New Media and go-to-market strategies for investments in digital marketing, technology, websites, mobile applications, eCommerce, social media and content. I help businesses, brands, VC's and startups build digital experiences that matter, expand their online presence and foster relationships that generate growth & revenue, especially as they coincide with their business objectives. Their investment in the web/technology, resources and rate of return are my focus. SPECIALITIESDigital Strategy & Execution, Email Marketing (Funnel Marketing), Social Media, Inbound Marketing, Branding, Content, Customer (Audience) Segmentation, Market Research, Customer/User Experience Mapping and Communicating the Final Product to the MarketThe formula for digital success is simple, “Focus on the customer and their user experience and they’ll be loyal to you.” AKA/Common Misspellings: Mat Gottesman, Matthew Gottesman, Matt Gottsman.
